protein.specific_function: Electroneutral exchange of protons for Na(+) and K(+) across the early and recycling endosome membranes. Contributes to calcium homeostasis

go_class.description: monovalent inorganic cation transmembrane transporter activity

reference.reference_text: Numata M, Petrecca K, Lake N, Orlowski J: Identification of a mitochondrial Na+/H+ exchanger. J Biol Chem. 1998 Mar 20;273(12):6951-9.
